en.name: AR-15 Magpul CTR Carbine stock with Cheek-riser
en.description: Drop-in replacement buttstock for AR15/M16 carbines by Magpul Original Equipment. Uses mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. Frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation, includes a standard 0.30 thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear. Comes in black and flat dark earth.

en.name: SA58/FAL humpback wooden stock
en.description: A wooden humpback-style stock for FAL-style rifles.

en.name: DPMS CAR-15 Fiberlite Stock
en.description: he Retro DPMS CAR-15 Kit alows you to add some throw back vibes with some modern features to your new build. Everything you need to complete out the stock assembly is included with this kit and will give your new build or existing lower that old school flare you have been craving.

en.name: AR-15 Armalite M16A1-style stock
en.description: The Armalite M16A1 Stock is a rugged, fixed polymer stock modeled after the original Vietnam-era design. Its classic shape offers solid recoil control and a timeless aesthetic for vintage rifle builds.

en.name: NCR Ranger M16A1 Wooden stock
en.description: Patrolling the Mojave almost makes you wish for a nuclear winter

en.name: Battle Arms AR-15 VERT GEN2 PDW Stock
en.description: Battle Arms AR-15 VERT PDW Stock System. With lightweight engineering this stock system is only 19.5 oz!  That's 30%-40% lighter that traditional PDW Stock Systems.  And with simple "bolt on" installation this stock system is compatible with most AR-15 style lower receivers.

en.name: ODIN WORKS Padded Pistol Buffer Tube
en.description: Padded pistol buffer tube.

en.name: Battle Arms AR-15 VERT GEN2 PDW Stock
en.description: Battle Arms AR-15 VERT PDW Stock System. With lightweight engineering this stock system is only 19.5 oz!  That's 30%-40% lighter that traditional PDW Stock Systems.  And with simple "bolt on" installation this stock system is compatible with most AR-15 style lower receivers.

en.name: HK MP5 A2 wooden stock
en.description: A custom wooden-finished fixed stock for the MP5A2 submachine gun manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

en.name: AR-15 Diemaco C7A2 Fiberlite stock
en.description: The C7A2 stock is a slightly modified version of the CAR-15 stock and features a bumpy texture for better grip in cold or CBRN (chemical, biological, radiological, and nuclear) conditions. Manufactured by Diemaco (a.k.a. Colt Canada)
